title: Hankou Cultural Sports Centre
text: Hankou Cultural Sports Centre (<a href="Simplified%20Chinese">Simplified Chinese</a>: 汉口文化体育中心) is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Wuhan">Wuhan</a>, <a href="China">China</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches. The stadium holds 20,000 people.
